catalog_script_client.name: onChange Auto populate Office Location

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_7ded4c6783401210e7a6f629feaad38a
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Request Loaner Vehicle">01843450834c5210e7a6f629feaad3fd</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:48cc091c838c5210e7a6f629feaad36f</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>onChange Auto populate Office Location</name><order/><published_ref/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
    if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
        return;
    }

    var userSysId = g_form.getValue('requested_for');

    if (userSysId) {
        var ga = new GlideAjax('UserDetails');
        ga.addParam('sys_id', userSysId);
        ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getUserLocation');
        ga.getXMLAnswer(function(response) {
            var userLocation = response;
            g_form.setValue('office_location', userLocation);
        });
    }
}
]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-08-21 23:25:17</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>7ded4c6783401210e7a6f629feaad38a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>onChange Auto populate Office Location</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Loaner Vehicle Request and Inventory" source="x_1426255_lva">0cb2d84c83081210e7a6f629feaad30b</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Loaner Vehicle Request and Inventory">0cb2d84c83081210e7a6f629feaad30b</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_7ded4c6783401210e7a6f629feaad38a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-08-22 00:12:16</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><va_supported>true</va_supported><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
